articles.title: Simu Liu urges fellow creatives to 'take space' and show the world how 'cool it is to be Asian' - CNA

articles.content:
Simu Liu is on a roll. Not only did he pick up the Peoples Choice Awards for best action movie star last week, he also received an accolade at The Unforgettable Gala that took place on Dec 11.
